snippet: Satellite Ballet, a company that emphasizes the collaborative process and onstage camaraderie, presented two works.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews performance of two works choreographed by Troy Schumacher and performed by Satellite Ballet at Gerald W Lynch Theater at John Jay College.
lead_paragraph: Satellite Ballet, a company that emphasizes the collaborative process and onstage camaraderie, presented two works.

headline.seo: Satellite Ballet at Gerald W. Lynch Theater
headline.main: Circling the City and the Cosmos Looking for Love
headline.print_headline: Circling the City and the Cosmos Looking for Love
